import React, { useContext } from 'react' import classes from './Cart.module.css' import Modal from '../UI/Modal' import CartContext from '../../store/cart-context' const Cart = props => { const { items, addItem, removeItem } = useContext(CartContext) const cartItems = items.map(item =>
  • {item.name}
    • ) const totalAmount = items.reduce((total, item) => { const itemPrice = item.price return total + itemPrice }, 0) return (
      {cartItems}
    Total Amount {totalAmount}
    ) } export default Cart
